plot outline: In a small village in Karnataka lives Docomo, a cowherd. He loves two things most, his bull and the village beauty Jummi. Coincidentally his bull loves Jummi' cow two. Ideal situation, don't you think? But what happens when greed and other human sins set in.
title: Dana Kayonu
plot: Docomo is a happy-go-lucky young man who grows up in a rural milieu. When he succeeds in rearing a special breed of Indian bull, he gains a great reputation and a huge fan following. How will his love life unfold?

In a small village in Karnataka lives Docomo, a cowherd. He loves two things most, his bull and the village beauty Jummi. Coincidentally his bull loves Jummi' cow two. Ideal situation, don't you think? But what happens when greed and other human sins set in.
